Broken Arrow.The Church at BattleCreek:
The Church at BattleCreek is the name and main campus of a rapidly growing, multi-site, evangelical church in Broken Arrow, Tulsa County, Oklahoma notable for its rapid growth. As of December, 2014, the Church drew 6,000 Christians to weekly worship services on multipleple campuses, including new sites in Chicago, Illinois and Cairo, Egypt.
